chunk:
Daylogic Moisturizing Facial Cleanser

Brand: Daylogic

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: AQUA, GLYCERIN, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, POLYSORBATE 20, STEARYL ALCOHOL, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CERAMIDE NS, CERAMIDE AS, GLYCERYL STEARATE, CARBOMER, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE (HYALURONIC ACID), CHOLESTEROL, PHENOXYETHANOL, DISODIUM EDTA, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE,

GLYCERYL STEARATE, CARBOMER, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, SODIUM HYALURONATE (HYALURONIC ACID), CHOLESTEROL, PHENOXYETHANOL, DISODIUM EDTA, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, HYDROGENATED LECITHIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, SUCROSE DISTEARATE.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
